cartItemNameLocator - Static variable in class com.challenge.pom.NavigationHeader
Is the locator that identifies the name of the elements in the shopping cart widget, only visible after hovering over the shopping cart widget.
cartItemPriceLocator - Static variable in class com.challenge.pom.NavigationHeader
Is the locator that identifies the price of the elements in the shopping cart widget, only visible after hovering over the shopping cart widget.
cartItemRemoveBtnLocator - Static variable in class com.challenge.pom.NavigationHeader
Is the locator that identifies the 'x' buttons of the elements in the shopping cart widget, only visible after hovering over the shopping cart widget.
cartItemsLocator - Static variable in class com.challenge.pom.NavigationHeader
Is the locator that identifies the shopping cart widget element.
cartItemsQuantityLocator - Static variable in class com.challenge.pom.NavigationHeader
Is the locator that identifies the text with the count of the amount of elements in the shopping cart widget.
categoriesLocator - Static variable in class com.challenge.pom.NavigationHeader
Is the locator that identifies the set categories' button element.
CategoryPage - Class in com.challenge.pom
This class extends the Base wrapper class and serves the same purpose, having this class it won't be necessary to modify the test in case something happens with current way to perform action.

Constructor class to instanciate.

This method clicks in the check out button of the shopping cart widget
checkOutShoppingWidgetBtnLocator - Static variable in class com.challenge.pom.NavigationHeader
Is the locator that identifies the 'check out' button in the shopping cart widget, only visible after hovering over the shopping cart widget.
clearAndSendKeys(String, By) - Method in class com.challenge.pom.Base
Method tries to find an inputtext element in the provided locator, clear (in case pending text was left in it) and writes the specified text
clearTypeAndSubmit(String, By) - Method in class com.challenge.pom.Base
Method tries to find an inputtext element in the provided locator, clear (in case pending text was left in it) and writes the specified text and submit the entry
click(By) - Method in class com.challenge.pom.Base
Wrapper class method to click the element found by the provided locator
click(WebElement) - Method in class com.challenge.pom.Base
Overridden wrapper class method to click the element provided
